body.description: From the #1 Brand for hair skin and nails (2), Nature's Bounty Hair, Skin & Nails Gummies are packed with biotin, and vital nutrients to support beautiful hair, glowing skin (1), and healthy nails (1) from the inside, out. Each serving of our delicious strawberry-flavored biotin gummies contain antioxidants Vitamins E and Vitamin C. Vitamin E contributes to skin health (1), and Vitamin C is involved in collagen production and formation, which forms the basis for vibrant skin, whereas biotin helps to maintain healthy hair (1). For additional wellness benefits, our unique formula is laboratory tested and includes no milk, lactose, soy, gluten, wheat, and fish. If you’re hoping to look and feel your best, Nature's Bounty Hair, Skin & Nails vitamins for women are a great way to support your natural beauty from within.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FROM THE #1 BRAND FOR HAIR, SKIN & NAILS (2) Ready to shine from the inside out? (1) Support your natural beauty with Nature’s Bounty Hair, Skin & Nail supplements. (1) From advanced softgels to delicious gummies and jelly beans, our wide range of products are designed to fit your lifestyle needs, whatever they may be. Each innovative formula is packed with Biotin and antioxidant vitamins C & E for beauty support. (1) Nature’s Bounty Hair, Skin & Nails Advanced Softgels are infused with argan oil and contain 5,000 mcg of biotin per serving, plus hyaluronic acid, a popular beauty ingredient. (1) Our Hair, Skin & Nails Gummies and Advanced Gummies are both bursting with delicious strawberry flavor and contain 2,500 mcg and 6,000 mcg of Biotin per serving, while our mixed berry Jelly Beans contain 6,000 mcg of Biotin plus Keratin. (1) Whether you decide to mix and match or stick with your favorite supplement, all of Nature’s Bounty Hair, Skin & Nails vitamins support your natural beauty from within. (1)

Upgrade Your Beauty Routine Make Nature’s Bounty Hair, Skin & Nails Supplements part of your daily routine to support beautiful hair, glowing skin, and healthy nails. (1) Shine From the Inside Out Packed with key beauty vitamins, Nature’s Bounty Hair, Skin & Nails supplements support vibrant skin to help you shine from the inside, out. (1) Quality You Can Count On As the #1 Brand for Hair, Skin & Nails, Nature’s Bounty is dedicated to quality, consistency, and scientific research.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great vitamins that taste great and actually work
reviews.reviewText: Nature’s bounty vitamins are top tier and my go to vitamins. As a post gastric bypass surgery patient, I take many vitamins and supplements including these hair skin and nail vitamins. These are not only delicious but work really great! My nails are so healthy and have grown so much and my hair although damaged from years of dying it, it has managed to grow with these vitamins! I haven’t seen any thing with my skin, I have a lot of skin issues so that may be why, however these vitamins are amazing! I highly recommend. NOT PAID FOR MY REVIEW, REAL BUYER AND HONEST REVIEW!

reviews.reviewText: I’ve had these before, this was a good buy. Cheaper than Walmart also. I think they work pretty good.

reviews.reviewText: These chewy gummies are quite tasty. My fingernails have always been weak; they crack, peel, and split. Since taking these gummies daily, I am able to grow stronger nails.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Lifesaver for My Hair and Nails!
reviews.reviewText: As a mother with a busy schedule, self-care often takes a back seat. But when I discovered Nature's Bounty Vitamin Biotin Optimal Solutions, it quickly became my secret weapon for maintaining healthy hair and nails.These little capsules are a true lifesaver. Not only are they easy to incorporate into my daily routine, but the results have been nothing short of fantastic. My hair has become shinier and stronger, and my nails have grown faster and are less prone to breakage. It's a confidence booster knowing that I'm taking care of myself, even on the busiest of days.What sets this product apart is its high-quality formulation. Nature's Bounty is a brand I trust, and the Biotin Optimal Solutions are no exception. The purity and effectiveness of these supplements are evident in the visible improvement of my hair and nails.Moreover, as a mother, I appreciate the boost of energy that comes with improved hair and nail health. It helps me keep up with my kids and manage my daily tasks with ease.The convenience of these capsules can't be overstated. With a busy household to run, I don't have time for complicated beauty routines. These supplements are a simple addition to my morning routine, and they do the job effectively.In conclusion, Nature's Bounty Vitamin Biotin Optimal Solutions has become my go-to choice for maintaining healthy hair and nails. I couldn't be happier with the results. If you're a mother looking to enhance your self-care regimen and enjoy the benefits of healthier hair and nails, this product is an absolute gem. It's a well-deserved 5-star recommendation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have Supplement
reviews.reviewText: The gummies are Dee-Lish-Shuss! To reap the benefits you need to be consistent. I have been taking these for over a year. I started to see noticeable changes in my hair and nails after @3months. Improvements have seen ever since. With the taste, I didn't mind the wait. The Strawberry flavor is everything.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tender, tasty and it does the job
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd order. It's soft, tasty, tender and it makes my hair healthier and more solid. Both my hubby and myself are taking it. Will keep going on with it.
